fun main() {
    door(15.635756564209714,46.55479152593426,15.63576897947462,46.55481782125079);
    chillOutSpot(15.63577017460372,46.554817215186006,15.635845938339799,46.554975578250634,15.636161040547421,46.55490449673985,15.636106001656884,46.55479538762461);
    chillOutSpot(15.636686466288182,46.554695389221564,15.636723678499095,46.554774145286956,15.63655400057425,46.55481554000036,15.636515695315836,46.55473544511915);
    wardrobe(15.636342706638345,46.55486345569699,15.636302706638105,46.55478253028292,15.636518249735559,46.554735461545334,15.636556760211846,46.55481696520525);
    wardrobe(15.636344427250663,46.55486289777426, 15.63630300285655,46.554782596365015,15.636119954293747,46.554824237118055,15.63616215396047,46.554903777301746);
    reception(15.635769637618381,46.55481786911949,15.635831593839185,46.55481511480863,15.63590066022914,46.55496274890962,15.635847212716214,46.55497456971659);
    toilet(15.635845405943229,46.554973644991975,15.635813225435584,46.55497975429299,15.635795622516866,46.55494246921802,15.635826557987855,46.55493640597081);
    toilet(15.63582739459224,46.55493655768376, 15.635796841300419,46.55494272262334, 15.63578435151345,46.554916711666124, 15.635814672710069,46.55491071918644);

    $lat = 15.635849404090266;
    $lon = 46.55459315120012;
    $newLat = 15.636383229498932;
    $newLon = 46.55446985218131;
    $latDiff = $(($($newLat-$lat))/10);
    $lonDiff = $(($($newLon-$lon))/10);



    for ($i = 0; $($i < 10); $i = $($i + 1)){
        if ($(($($i%2)) == 0)) {
            wall($lat,$lon,$($lat + $latDiff),$($lon + $lonDiff));
        }
        else {
            window($lat,$lon,$($lat + $latDiff),$($lon + $lonDiff));
        }

        $lat = $($lat + $latDiff);
        $lon = $($lon + $lonDiff);
    }


    addWalls();
    trainingSpace(15.636176948748982,46.554593875678734,15.636196272133617,46.55462535476272,15.63605398074634,46.55468217702014,15.636016872130455,46.55462988004342);
}

fun addWalls() {
    moonboard(15.635749643916768,46.55477452865455,15.635830825960142,46.554755402260895);
    climbingWall(15.6359535461971,46.55473323142559,15.63590243103053,46.554627603464155);
    sprayWall(15.635750640712246,46.55477361174147,15.635683877785311,46.55463115649397);
    sprayWall(15.635685390196784,46.554633124843065,15.635851038677998,46.55459434661162);
    wall(15.636290474391927,46.55461929111442, 15.636270603443052,46.55457097395808);
    wall(15.63627163348977,46.55457124885757, 15.636013607342619,46.55462770734988);
    wall(15.6360911443482,46.554739501134065,15.636013932400942,46.55462762034381);
    climbingWall(15.635905118185605,46.55462893471224, 15.636469609664715,46.55451457798989);
    climbingWall(15.636381306045223,46.55447055315258,15.636551693350867,46.554431152202);
    climbingWall(15.636548932368584,46.55443314988824, 15.636682064091275,46.5546968962509);
    climbingWall(15.63647065331216,46.554516200826185, 15.63654656772826,46.5546478551029);
    climbingWall(15.63654656772826,46.5546478551029, 15.636415012971213,46.5547060946391);
    climbingWall(15.635954284796725,46.554732072087205,15.636091618934444,46.554738940880156);
    climbingWall(15.636417354801324,46.5547060517907, 15.636256421646863,46.55471925417072);
    climbingWall(15.636256146819306,46.55471900557362,15.636207330806826,46.554646249046954);
    climbingWall(15.63620849751777,46.55464587495962,15.63627857506134,46.55469529001053);
    sprayWall(15.636278897115602,46.55469579082114, 15.636496840764778,46.554647801784625);
    climbingWall(15.636496859773729,46.554648618029006,15.636469582469772,46.55459615707679);
    climbingWall(15.636470301078106,46.55459685656717,15.636295948842303,46.55463216180905);
    climbingWall(15.636296706894285,46.55463243479673, 15.63643811654947,46.55458898120551);
    climbingWall(15.63643818389724,46.55458872087132,15.636411502997788,46.554538396327104);
    climbingWall(15.636410761430398,46.55453726246208,15.63627254969228,46.55457529751351);
    climbingWall(15.636273442236927,46.5545753496846,15.636291781099345,46.554619203946146);

    wall(15.636685361614525, 46.554694617887264,15.636551790553995,46.55442725259394);
    wall(15.636552401497255,46.55442802008244,15.636379798048381,46.55446906815885);
    wall(15.636554054249075,46.554815834315264,15.635844194533462,46.55497475759063);
    wall(15.635769321451306, 46.5548173398621, 15.635845262268646, 46.55497455498545);
    wall(15.635756163290381, 46.55479141877029, 15.635681791369763, 46.55463260799081);
    wall(15.635680592830198,46.55463156883917,15.635849938250573,46.55459179823788);
}
